pages.text: Levitation causes the affected entity to float upwards at a rate of 0.9 blocks per level per second.  This does not affect swimming or flying. $(br2)An affected entity does not take fall damage until the effect wears off, after which the entity falls and takes damage as usual from falling.$(br2)Levitation has no effect on players riding entities. It also has no effect on entities that are in water or lava.
